articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance Given by State Merited Chorus on Opening of Kalma Theatre
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance Given by State Merited Chorus on Opening of Kalma Theatre
Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by the State Merited Chorus on the occasion of the opening of the Kalma Theatre.
					 He first went round the newly built Kalma Theatre at the Kalma Rest Home of the KPA.
					
					 The theatre is another gift given by him to the servicepersons of the KPA out of his loving care. 
					
					 After walking round the interior of the theatre, he expressed great satisfaction with the successful building of the modern theatre equipped with all facilities and highly appreciated the feats performed by soldier-builders.
					
					 The servicepersons of the KPA devoting themselves to the sacred struggle for defending the country are the precious revolutionary comrades, revolutionary comrades-in-arms who cannot be bartered for anything, he said, adding that nothing should be spared for them.
					
					 Then he enjoyed an art performance given by the State Merited Chorus on the occasion of the opening of the theatre.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the army, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and Jang Song Thaek and Choe Ik Gyu, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and other leading officials of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 The chorus put on the stage male choruses "The Forest Sways" and "The Sound of Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu," male solos and male choruses "My Native Place" and "For My Only Motherland", male chorus "The Road of Victory" and other numbers.
					
					 Through the performance the artistes enthusiastically sang of the immense honor and pride of the KPA holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces and truthfully represented the fixed faith and will of the KPA to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms under the uplifted great banner of Songun.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied with the splendid performance replete with the faith and will of Songun Korea and the revolutionary soldier spirit given by the above-said artistes and highly appreciated their successful presentation. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that all the artistes of the chorus would positively encourage the army and the people in new struggles and the efforts to perform feats through their dynamic revolutionary art activities in the future, too, and thus fully display the might of the buglers of the Songun revolution and the militant art unit.

articles.title: Wreaths Placed before Grave of Ri Po Ik
articles.content:
Wreaths Placed before Grave of Ri Po Ik
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the grave of Ri Po Ik, ardent patriot, in Mangyongdae on Sunday on the occasion of the 133rd anniversary of her birth.
					 Seen standing before her grave was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed there were wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, ministries and national institutions, military universities, educational and media organizations and party and power organs and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to her, looking back on her noble life and exploits.
					
					 Present there were Choe Yong Rim and others.

articles.title: Cases of Aerial Espionage against DPRK on Steady Increase
articles.content:
Cases of Aerial Espionage against DPRK on Steady Increase
Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets perpetrated at least 200 cases of aerial espionage against the DPRK in May or 30 cases more than those in the same month of last year by mobilizing strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes with various missions, according to a military source.
					The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces committed more than 110 cases while the south Korean puppet army at least 90 cases.
					
					On May 28 and 29, the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' overseas-based five RC-135s flew into the air over south Korea and were busy with aerial surveillance and photographing and electronic espionage against all areas of the DPRK.
					
					South Korea-based U-2 made shuttle flights from the east to the west all day long on May 30 to spy on the DPRK. The number of cases of aerial espionage perpetrated by this plane reached 25 this month.
					
					The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets let more than 40 strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes fly in the air over the front areas to intensify the espionage against the DPRK side in the period from May 7 to 13 when they were busy with combined air battle exercises in the air over areas of south Korea.
					
					In the meantime, the south Korean bellicose forces let two or three tactical reconnaissance planes make shuttle flights in the air over front areas in the East and West seas and the areas along the Military Demarcation Line day and night every day on spy missions.

articles.title: Resignation of Lee Myung Bak Regime Demanded
articles.content:
Resignation of Lee Myung Bak Regime Demanded
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils issued a statement on May 26 in which it urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" to step down.
					 The statement branded the Lee regime's official declaration of south Korea's full participation in the PSI under the pretext of the north's underground nuclear test as an act of pushing the inter-Korean relations to total collapse and bringing the dark clouds of a war.
					
					 Noting that south Korea's full participation in the PSI is, in fact, little short of infringing upon the sovereignty of the north, the statement declared that the Lee's policy of confrontation would bring only a horrible disaster to the nation as he is acting a servant for the U.S., unhesitatingly contemplating even a military conflict, not content with bringing the inter-Korean relations to collapse.
					
					 The statement resolutely demanded the Lee "government" retract the decision to fully participate in the PSI, a threat to peace on the Korean Peninsula, and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: WPK's Cause of Songun Praised by Turkish Figure
articles.content:
WPK's Cause of Songun Praised by Turkish Figure 
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The cause of Songun of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Kim Jong Il is sure to win, said Dasar Karadag, member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Turkey, when interviewed by KCNA at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on May 29.
					 He praised President Kim Il Sung as the great leader who founded the invincible WPK.
					
					 The WPK could grow strong and develop to be a powerful party standing unfazed in any storm as it was led by the President, he noted.
					
					 He said that the WPK has developed into an ever-victorious party under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who has successfully carried forward the cause of the President.
					
					 He noted that the WPK has become a model of the progressive political parties aspiring after socialism.
					
					 Saying that the Workers' Party of Turkey will always stand on the side of the WPK in the struggle against imperialism, he stressed that his party fully supported Kim Jong Il's cause of Songun.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Underground Nuclear Test Hailed as Victory of Songun Politics
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Underground Nuclear Test Hailed as Victory of Songun Politics
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee released a statement on May 26 hailing the second successful nuclear test conducted by the DPRK.
					 The statement asserted that the recent nuclear test conducted by the DPRK amounted to a clear and just reaction to the UNSC's stand of arrogantly turning down the demand of the DPRK for retracting all the "resolutions" and decisions adopted against the DPRK and making an apology for them.
					
					 The statement referred to the fact that the DPRK has the right to test nuclear weapons and missiles and other weapons selected by it in order to defend its sovereignty and territory as is the case with all other sovereign states.
					
					 The U.S. and Japan, the sworn enemies of the Korean people, are threatening to apply additional sanctions against the DPRK through the UNSC but they can never bring the DPRK to its knees, the statement warned, and continued: 
					
					 We vehemently denounce the moves of the UNSC and other bodies against the DPRK, terming them a crime and a declaration of war against it. 
					
					 We regard Western media's smear campaign against the DPRK as an act of aggression because it is nothing but a product of the U.S. plot. 
					
					 The DPRK's recent nuclear test constitutes another shining victory of the Songun politics pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
